snippet: American law enforcement officials on Thursday acknowledged the death of Heriberto Lazcano Lazcano, one of the most wanted and ruthless drug lords in both countries.
abstract: American law enforcement officials acknowledge death of Heriberto Lazcano Lazcano, one of most wanted and ruthless drug lords, four days after he was gunned down by Mexican Marines.
lead_paragraph: American law enforcement officials on Thursday acknowledged the death of Heriberto Lazcano Lazcano, one of the most wanted and ruthless drug lords in both countries.

headline.main: Mexico: U.S. Affirms Drug Lord ID
headline.print_headline: Mexico: U.S. Affirms Drug Lord ID
